description:
Love Rice started a rice riot at the Harvest Festival and became a sensation overnight. They`ve been super busy with TV appearances, rice planting, and other activities, but the group`s leader, Hinohikari, is acting strange... Meanwhile, a new exchange student arrives at Inaho Academy, and he`s a ramen HarveStar named Sho. The members of Love Rice can`t help feeling flustered by the appearance of a new rival. What will come of the peace that had settled between the grains?
Source: crunchyroll
